programme.title: ABC News At Noon

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Adam and guests, Para-athletic champion Isis Holt and Tassie food champion Massimo Mele, make magic with cured meats.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: Australian doctor Ken Elliott tells his extraordinary story of being held captive in the Saharan desert by Al Qaeda terrorists for more than 7 years. Dr Elliott was 81 when he was kidnapped with his wife from Burkina Faso.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations
programme.desc: In Adelaide's Henley Beach, Paul and Marie transform an electricity converter station into a high-end entertainer's home, while on the Gold Coast, Chris and Antoinette reimagine a run-down house into a coastal retreat.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: Marking two centuries of Australia's biggest beef producer; The market comes to the farm at the annual circuit sheep sale; Saving the rainbow bones of Lightning Ridge; and growing microalgae as a food additive.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Muscle Man was pranking Mordecai by duct taping his mattress onto the ceiling, when Pops walks into the room, chasing a balloon, making the mattress fall onto Pops sending him to the hospital.

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: While Max and Gwen revel in the holiday spirit of Winter Wonderland, Ben couldn't be more unamused and focused on the toys, but once the Weatherheads set their sights on Winter Wonderland as their next target, our hero must become one with his emotion if he is to save the town.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: When Chowder becomes aware of the affects of old age, he decides to stop it at its source - he'll conquer Old Man Time.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets him wind back the minute that has just passed by, and can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. This will give him an advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they don't get their hands on it.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy starts using more than 10% of his brain in an effort to find the hidden images in a puzzle.

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: The babies of the choir arrive at the Rainbow Daycare Center with a great surprise, a musical lunch box. The Power Rockers are very excited to eat what's inside, but to open it they must learn to harmonize their voices.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they don’t.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: A love-potion formula accidentally gets on Jerry when Napoleon tries to use it against Tom.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: When the Titans' beach day is ruined by garbage in the ocean, they learn all about recyling.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: On their way to the beach, Amato and Pian discover that the town is being turned into ice by a bad robot named Sejuku.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The Bears are stranded on a subway platform after missing their train. But while waiting, the Bears are challenged with recovering some lost items.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Sick of Granny Jojo's ugly gifts, Nicole encourages the kids to take matters into their own hands and "accidentally" break her latest hideous vase. But when Gumball, Darwin and Anais try to destroy it, they discover it is more robust than it seems.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket’s Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: When Starfire becomes obsessed with an ice cream scoop, the others try to teach her that inanimate objects can't replace people.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: The bad robot Cloudiva is causing freak weather events around town. Amato has to stop her, before things get even worse.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Bugs’ new roommate is a big, big problem. Daffy builds a nest in Elmer’s satellite dish.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! The Docs realise this and try it out themselves, only for it to backfire.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings: World Tour
programme.desc: Grizzy decides to adopt a coconut. The Lemmings decide to hide inside other coconuts to be adopted too!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After Clarence accidentally knocks Belson's new videogame down a storm drain, Belson enters the large underground sewer tunnel to retrieve it. When Belson doesn't return, Clarence must decide whether or not to go in after him...

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: On their way to the beach, Amato and Pian discover that the town is being turned into ice by a bad robot named Sejuku.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wicket’s. Bean is entranced.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The Bears are stranded on a subway platform after missing their train. But while waiting, the Bears are challenged with recovering some lost items.

programme.title: Lego Dreamzzz
programme.desc: When Mateo’s comic creation, Z-Blob, follows him from a dream back to Brooklyn, Mateo and his sister realize the Dream World is real, and in danger!

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Finn and Jake find themselves paralyzed from the neck down and at the Ice King's mercy!

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven and the Crystal Gems revisit the Kindergarten and find a dark secret.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road, they can accelerate truck traffic and create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: The Girls get into trouble when left to entertain themselves on a rainy day.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven tries to avoid Connie so he doesn’t have to tell her about his most recent harrowing adventure.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: The guys must return a video to the rental store.

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: After Billy Billions' efforts to carve his face onto Mount Rushmore with a laser are thwarted by Ben, the billionaire brat turns his focus on removing Ben from the Omnitrix, but once he accidentally rips opens up a rift in space-time, the two must carefully navigate another timeline if they are to return to the present.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: In charge of Chowder for the weekend, Shnitzel is forced to go to Chowder's favorite theme restaurant.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight who has just delivered his beloved. As he is about to take her in his arms, he is woken by the din of the Lemmings, who have chosen this particular day to blast music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. But first, he'll have to stop the Lemmings' fiesta.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin introduces the other Titans to a money making application but they soon learn the dangers of a shareconomy.

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: The Power Rockers are playing their instruments in the garden, when suddenly Carlos whistles for the first time!

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the ranger's mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny is being kept awake by a bad case of the hiccups. Half asleep, he guzzles down a midnight drink. Turns out Specs has forgotten sharehouse rule number one: DON'T KEEP EXPERIMENTAL LAB CONCOCTIONS IN THE KITCHEN FRIDGE.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from attending a date with Toodles. When Butch shows up instead, Toodles suprises him with babysitting her misbehaving nieces and nephews. Tom tries to escape from the basement but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think it's a monster downstairs.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Mechamato

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Some new neighbors set up camp next to the Bears' cave. Panda and Ice love it, but Grizz thinks they're up to no good.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are confused when they meet Kiki and Quack, a pair of siblings that copy everything they do and say. When they fail to encourage them to find their own identity, the Wattersons realise they need a more permanent solution...

programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until they’re done.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Some new neighbors set up camp next to the Bears' cave. Panda and Ice love it, but Grizz thinks they're up to no good.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are confused when they meet Kiki and Quack, a pair of siblings that copy everything they do and say. Then they find out this copycat family is making money online from imitating the Watterson family! When they fail to encourage them to find their own identity, the Wattersons realise they need a more permanent solution...

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin introduces the other Titans to a money making application but they soon learn the dangers of a shareconomy.

programme.title: Ninjago: Dragons Rising
programme.desc: Cole reunites with Nya to help her and Sora find the Dragon Core in the Land of Lost Things, and Kai uses Heatwaves recovery to connect with Wyldfyre.

programme.title: Lego Dreamzzz
programme.desc: After a daring mission to save their friend in the Dream World, Mateo and Izzie find the nightmare has followed them back to the Waking World.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Finn and Jake do battle with a powerful door lord.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven and the Crystal Gems revisit the Kindergarten and find a dark secret.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road, they can accelerate truck traffic and create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: China Showbiz
programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenix’s (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby…

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap…

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead…

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his son’s talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80’s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition – to live the American dream.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Assignment Asia
programme.desc: Assignment Asia is a current affairs program that takes an in-depth look at stories from all over Asia. The show focuses on people. It puts the spotlight on issues affecting the region through interviews with and first-person accounts of ordinary people with extraordinary stories.

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving CGTN a competitive edge in the North American media market.

programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation. Our exclusive features, "Tackling China", "CBA Stories", and "Beyond the Baseline", take you behind the scenes and closer to the top athletes in China, by providing a unique perspective on the top sports stories.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. Hundreds of state heads, diplomats, business leaders and culture icons have appeared on DIALOGUE . It reaches viewers across China and over 80 million subscribers around the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

programme.title: Senggol-Senggolan
programme.desc: Elvi dan Adi yang yatim piatu pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari Johny, seorang promotor pertunjukan yang pernah meminta Elvi bernyanyi di desanya. Sesampainya disana mereka terpisah. Adi hidup mirip gelandangan sementara Elvi masuk rekaman dan sukses. Elvi terus mencari adiknya yang ternyata adalah sahabat supir Dicky, kekasih sekaligus produser Elvi. Pencarian pun akhirnya membuahkan hasil.

programme.title: Kawin Kontrak Lagi
programme.desc: Jody kini sudah beranjak kuliah. Dirinya menjadi playboy dikalangan warga kampus dan menjadi panutan bagi tiga perjaka kampus, yakni Fredo, Hakim, dan Menfo. Ketiganya selalu mencoba mengikuti gaya-gaya Jody dalam menjalankan kehidupan cintanya.

programme.title: Cintaku Di Kampus Biru

programme.title: Hijrah Cinta
programme.desc: Film ini mengisahkan tentang almarhum ustad gaul Jeffri Al-Buchori. Perjuangan dalam hidupnya untuk menjadi manusia lebih baik lagi ketika ia mencintai Pipik dan ia pun juga meninggalkan narkoba.

programme.title: Giliran Saya Mana
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang pasangan muda yang terpaksa kawin lari karena orangtua sang wanita hanya mau anaknya menikah dengan orang kaya. Setelah menikah, mereka berdua mengaku sudah kaya, padahal belum. masalah bermula ketika mereka memutuskan untuk berpura-pura menjadi orang kaya dan meminjam rumah mewah kepada temannya. Disinilah adegan-adegan lucu banyak disajikan, sampai akhirnya mereka ketahuan jikalau mereka berbohong.

programme.title: Hijab
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keempat sahabat Anin, Bia,Tata dan Sari. Mereka mempunyai gaya berpenampilan berbeda-beda kecuali Anin yang tidak memakai Hijab. Kegalauan mereka semakin meningkat karena mereka berhijab dan mendapatkan uang dari "Ikut Suami". Namun hal itu dibantah dengan mereka membangun bisnis Hijab dan berhasil. Dengan penghasilan mereka yang melebihi para suaminya, keharmonisan rumah tangga merekapun mulai diuji.

Menceritakan tentang rumah yang baru ditempati oleh Kevin dan Nayla. Mereka bertetangga oleh Julian, Dita dan anaknya Lila. Namun ternyata rumah mereka berpenghuni mahluk halus yang selalu meneror keluarga-nya. Kejadian fatal yang membuat Nayla membunuh Kevin adalah ketika Nayla diperkosa oleh mahluk halus yang menyerupai Kevin hingga Nayla hamil.

programme.title: Kuntilanak
programme.desc: Di kamar kost baru Samantha, terdapat mitos kuntilanak & dia mulai merasakan keanehan yang berujung pada terungkapnya jati diri Sam yang sebenarnya.

programme.title: Kuntilanak 2 (2019)
programme.desc: Di film pertama, Dinda berhasil lolos dari teror kuntilanak. Ia kemudian berniat menemui Karmila yang diyakini sebagai ibu kandungnya. Sialnya, Dinda yang berangkat bersama adik dan temannya malah terjebak dalam rumah di tengah hutan. Kejanggalan mulai terjadi di rumah tersebut. Dinda harus kembali berhadapan dengan kuntilanak.

programme.title: Dunia Mereka
programme.desc: Film ini menceritakan tentang sebuah band yang terdiri dari beberapa orang yang mempertemukan mereka karena selera musik yang sama. Namun dalam perjalanan mereka, berbagai masalah pun berdatangan.

programme.title: Tiga
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang masa depan di tahun 2036. Dikisahkan oleh tiga sahabat bernama Alif, Lam dan Mim yang ditemukan dengan situasi dimana mereka harus berjuangan atas kebenaran masing-masing.

programme.title: Suami-Suami Takut Istri
programme.desc: Demi mengabulkan permintaan para istri yang meminta berbulan madu ke Bali, para suami pun mengajak para istri ke Bali. Walaupun sebenarnya ada maksud lain dibalik kebaikan para suami. Mereka berencana untuk menghadiri pertunjukan super sexy dari Trio Ganas. Namun akhirnya para istri mengetahui adanya rencana lain dari para suami.

programme.title: Si Manis Jembatan Ancol
programme.desc: Maryam, sosok perempuan yang mencari kebahagiaan saat rumah tangganya dengan lelaki bernama Roy berada di ambang kehancuran. Hadirnya sosok Yudha mampu membuat Maryam menemukan ketenangan. Namun, sebuah kejadian tragis harus menimpanya. Setelah itu legenda menyeramkan mulai tersebar.

programme.title: Pengantin Pantai Biru
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang sekumpulan orang yang berlibur ke sebuah pantai yang indah namun dipercaya kental dengan unsur mistis. Peringatan terhadap kehadiran mahluk gaib sedari awal sudah diperingatkan, namun mereka tidak menggubrisnya, sampai satu per satu dari mereka menghilang.

programme.title: Kawin Kontrak 3
programme.desc: Film ini merupakan kelajutan film sebelumnya, kisah dimulai ketika Kang Sono digantikan oleh Gerry sebagai makelar kawin kontrak. Dalam film ini terdapat 3 orang bernama Ceppy, Itol dan Dani. Petulangan cinta mereka dimulai ketika mereka diperkenalkan Gerry oleh juragan Janda Herang pembisnis kawin kontrak.

programme.title: Lutung Kasarung
programme.desc: Karena menginginkan istri yang secantik ibunya, maka guru Minda dikutuk oleh ibunya sendiri menjadi Lutung Kasarung. yang akan berubah menjadi manusia lagi, ketika ada wanita yang mencintainya

programme.title: Kabut Sutra Ungu
programme.desc: Miranti ditinggal mati suaminya yang mengalami kecelakaan sebagai pilot. Hidup menjanda ini yang lalu membawa banyak masalah, mulai dari keusilan kawan lama, pemuda tanggung, maupun kenalan baru. Miranti tetap berusaha hidup mandiri.

programme.title: Jamila Dan Sang Presiden
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan bernama Jamila tiba-tiba menjadi headline di semua pemberitaan nasional. Ia mengaku membunuh seorang pejabat tinggi dan menolak mengajukan grasi kepada Presiden.

programme.title: Gentayangan
programme.desc: Abimanyu Karindra tak punya pilihan selain membawa istrinya, Sofia dan kedua anak mereka serta adiknya Sheila untuk menetap di hotel peninggalan orangtua di lembah gunung ratusan kilometer dari Jakarta, setelah dinyatakan bangkrut oleh pengadilan. Hotel Kaki Langit yang awalnya dianggap sebagai tempat tinggal yang nyaman dan tenang, berubah menjadi teror menakutkan hanya beberapa saat setelah keluarga Karindra mulai menempatinya.

programme.title: Maju Kena Mundur Kena Returns
programme.desc: Berkisah Trio WOW: Wira, Ozie dan Wulu yang tertantang menyelinap masuk ke asrama cewek-cewek cantik yang berdekatan dengan mini market tempat kerja mereka. Supaya bisa masuk Wira pura-pura impoten, Ojie pura-pura buta, sedangkan Wulu menyelinap ke asrama seperti maling.

programme.title: Menggapai Matahari
programme.desc: Mobil yang dikendarai Tika, kekasih Rhoma Irama, menabrak Selvy hingga tewas. Rhoma Irama mengaku sebagai pengendara mobil tersebut untuk meyelamatkan kekasihnya dari penjara. Indra, kekasih Selvy, berusaha merebut Tika dari Rhoma Irama, sedangkan Beny Compo, kakak Selvy, berusaha menghancurkan karir musik Rhoma Irama sebagai pelampiasan dendam

programme.title: Melodi Cinta Rhoma Irama
programme.desc: Rhoma jatuh cinta dengan Ricca dan sempat merencanakan pernikahan. Namun jalinan cinta mereka diganggu oleh Herman yang juga mencintai Ricca dan ingin menguasai harta ayah Ricca

programme.title: Cinta Tapi Beda
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang sepasang kekasih yang berbeda keyakinan Diana dan Cahyo. Namun saat mereka mulai mencoba melanjutkan ke jenjang yang lebih serius, orang tua mereka sangat bertentangan dengan rencana ini. Hingga dilema mereka memuncak saat Diana dijodohkan oleh Oka pria pilihan ibunya.

programme.title: Selamanya
programme.desc: Aristha berjumpa dengan kekasih lamanya, Bara, di kantor polisi. Bara, yang merasa bersalah karena menjerumuskan Aristha ke dunia narkoba, berusaha keras menarik Aristha dari dunia itu

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Lagi
programme.desc: Lila adalah pengacara idealis yang suka membela perempuan teraniaya dan Andre adalah pengacara dengan kasus-kasus "kelas kakap". Keduanya bertemu dalam kasus perceraian seorang penyanyi dangdut

programme.title: Cowok Bikin Pusing
programme.desc: 3 sahabat sejati yang selalu mendukung untuk semua hal, termasuk kisah sakit hati dengan makhluk yang namanya Cowok.

programme.title: Mencari Hilal
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang Mahmud yang selalu ingin mengajarkan bahwa Islam itu adalah agama untuk semua persoalan hidup. Dalam perjalannya mencari hilal dengan caranya yang sederhana tanpa menelan biaya sampai milyaran rupiah yang selama ini dilakukan oleh pemerintah, langkahnya terhalang dengan anaknya bernama Heli. Heli selau melontarkan pikiran liberalnya hingga membuat Mahmud gerah.

programme.title: Setannya Kok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Dedi dan Beno yang bekerja di kamar mayat berkenalan dengan Maya. Maya yang baru saja kehilangan kakeknya mendapatkan warisan rumah berikut perkebunannya. Namun karena menemukan banyak keanehan di rumah itu, Maya menyewa Dedi dan Beno untuk menjaga rumah warisan tersebut.

programme.title: Afc Asian Cup 2024: Kor Vs Idn
Afc Asian Cup 2024: Kor Vs Idn
Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.desc: A boy having little presence writes a poem. A girl who went missing without a reason a year ago. However, the secret of death has been lying in that poem. This is a story of an adventure of a boy and him tracing the secrets.

programme.desc: Eri (Kuninaka Ryoko), from Kohama island, Okinawa, moves to Tokyo to become a nurse while cherishing a childhood promise of marriage with Fumiya (Kohashi Kenji). After reuniting with Fumiya, who is now a doctor, they get married and return to their hometown to dedicate themselves to providing medical support for locals. Amid a life filled with hard work and joy, holding onto her grandmother's saying, ‘Life is the greatest treasure,’ Eri brings the “moisture of the southern islands” to people's hearts.

programme.title: BMW BERLIN-MARATHON 2024
programme.desc: One of the sport's six prestigious Majors and famous for its flat, broad streets and forgiving super-fast course, the BMW BERLIN-MARATHON attracts some 45,000 elite and amateur runners from 150 nations.

programme.title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
programme.desc: Surinder, a simple man, falls for a vivacious Tani and gets married to her. In order to impress her, he undergoes a complete makeover and becomes Raj. Release Year: 2008 Director: Aditya Chopra Awards: Best Actor: Shah Rukh Khan Apsara Film Producers Guild Awards; Best Playback Singer - Male: Sukhwinder Singh, Best Scene of the Year Filmfare Awards

programme.title: 3 Deewarein
programme.desc: Three prisoners become friends. Chandrika wants to make a documentary on them. As it progresses, she forms a special bond with them. Release Year: 2003 Director: Nagesh Kukunoor Awards: Best Story: Nagesh Kukunoor Filmfare Awards; Best Supporting ActreSS: Juhi Chawla Screen Weekly Awards;

programme.title: Bioscopewala
programme.desc: A woman meets her dead father's old friend, who was the operator of a Bioscope show that she loved in her childhood. Connecting India and Afghanistan, a story of love and cinema unfolds. Release Year: 2017 Director: Deb Medhekar Awards: 2018 Nominee FOI Online Award - Best Screenplay Adapted - Deb Medhekar, Radhika Anand

programme.title: Mahabali Bal Ganesh VI
programme.desc: Top, Dhoti and Suitboot land on Kailash Parbat where they meet Nandi and Mooshak Raj. There, they come across stories about Bal Ganesh, who fights to rid the world of demons. Release Year: 2019 Director: Vijay S. Bhanushali

programme.title: Ek Aur Singham - The Real Police Cop
programme.desc: An honest police officer works zealously to fight against corruption and evil politicians who break the law of the nation.

programme.title: Dolly Ki Doli
programme.desc: The story revolves around a conwoman, Dolly who cons men into marrying her and on the marriage night steals their wealth and runs away. Release Year: 2015 Director: Abhishek Dogra Awards: 1 win and 3 nominations

programme.title: Khuddar
programme.desc: Shastri has two sons, Siddhant and Nandu. Siddhant is an honest son and Nandu falls into bad company. Siddhant has to choose to be corrupt or be honest. Release Year: 1994 Director: Iqbal Durrani

programme.title: Imtihaan
programme.desc: Vicky is a singer who falls in love with Priti. She agrees to marry him but is hiding something about her past. Will it be discovered? Release Year: 1994 Director: Harry Baweja

programme.title: The Great Indian Family
programme.desc: Ved Vyas Tripathi, aka Bhajan Kumar, is a devout Hindu man who faces an identity crisis and a personal dilemma when he discovers he is actually a Muslim by birth. Release Year: 2023 Director: Vijay Krishna Acharya

programme.title: Kaala Patthar
programme.desc: Vijay Singh is a disgraced former navy officer who is branded as a coward and forced to work at a coal mine out of guilt. However, he gets trapped with other miners after a flood hits them. Release Year: 1979 Director: Yash Chopra

programme.title: Baghban
programme.desc: Story of an elderly couple who are thought of as a burden by their children. How do they retain their dignity? Release Year: 2003 Director: Ravi Chopra Awards: Screen Weekly Awards- Jodi no.1- Amitabh Bachchan and Hema Malini, Best Actor- Amitabh Bachchan , Best ActreSS- Hema Malini. Zee Cine Awards- Best Sound Re-recording.

programme.title: Darr
programme.desc: Rahul is obsessed with Kiran and stalks her constantly. However, Rahul goes berserk when she gets engaged to Sunil, a navy officer, and he decides to forcefully claim Kiran for himself. Release Year: 1993 Director: Yash Chopra Awards: Filmfare Awards- Best Comedian/Comedienne Anupam Kher , Silver Lotus Award- Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment Yash Chopra

programme.title: Kris Aur Krishna
programme.desc: For a chip designed by his father, goons kidnap Kris. His grandmother prays to Lord Krishna for help, who comes disguised as a young boy, Kris. Release Year: 2009 Director: Vikram Veturi

programme.title: Roadside Romeo
programme.desc: Abandoned by his owners, rich dog Romeo embarks on adventures, encountering various situations and even falling in love. Release Year: 2008 Director: Jugal Hansraj Awards: 2010 Winner Golden Lotus Award - Best Animation Film - Aditya Chopra producer, Jugal Hansraj director, 2010 Winner National Film Award - Best Animation Film - Pankaj Khandpur Creative Director

programme.title: Housefull 4
programme.desc: Three pairs of reincarnated lovers reunite in the present day -- but the men wind up falling for the wrong women. Release Year: 2019 Director: Farhad Samji Awards: 2020 Winner Bollywood BusineSS Award - The 200 Crore Club

programme.title: Sachaa Jhutha
programme.desc: Ranjith, a thief, hires Bhola, a lookalike, to take his place, while he executes the robbery. However, Bhola soon gets trapped in the world of crime. Release Year: 1970 Director: Manmohan Desai Awards: 1970 Edinburgh International Film Festival - Best Actor - Rajesh Khanna, 1971 Winner Filmfare Award - Best Actor - Rajesh Khanna

programme.title: Lamhe
programme.desc: Viren falls for Pallavi, but she marries Siddharth. The couple dies, leaving behind their daughter, who grows up to look just like her mother and falls in love with Viren. Release Year: 1991 Director: Yash Chopra Awards: Filmfare Awards- Best Film, Best ActreSS- SriDevi, Best Comedian- Anupam Kher, Best Story, Best Dialogue.

programme.title: Bhoothnath
programme.desc: Moving into a new house, a family witnesses an unfriendly ghost who wants to drive them away from the house. However, he befriends a little boy who changes his outlook forever. Release Year: 2008 Director: Vivek Sharma Awards: Screen Awards- Best Special Effects- Biju Dhanpalan

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mother's promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Maati Se Bandhi Dor
programme.desc: Hard-working Vaiju labours in the fields to support her family and village, but she finds her life facing an unexpected challenge when Rannvijay dismisses her as a potential wife.

programme.title: Iss Ishq Ka…Rabb Rakha
programme.desc: Ranbir is a proud sardar who falls in love with a Bengali woman, Meghla. But sparks fly when their culturally different families come face-to-face.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: A dreamy-eyed Sayali yearns for her prince charming. But when destiny ties her with hero-cum-thug Sachin, will her hopes for a fairytale life prevail?

programme.title: Advocate Anjali Awasthi
programme.desc: Star Plus has ventured into an unexplored territory and brings for the audience its new show Advocate Anjali Awasthi, starring Shritama Mitra (Advocate Anjali Awasthi) and Ankit Raizada (Aman Singh Rajpoot). The show is produced by Blues Productions.

programme.title: Do Dooni Pyaar
programme.desc: The journey of Ganga and sheds light on the topic of forced marriage.

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa, who parts with her ambitions and goals in a bid to raise her family, feels dejected when she fails to get any credit for her sacrifices and trials. She then decides to live on her own terms.

Lucky Singh Ahlawat is a famous wrestler and is known for his looks. A series of events causes Komal and Lucky to get married.

programme.title: Munna Michael
programme.desc: Michael is an aging dancer in films is fired from his job as he looks older in between the young lot of dancers. Michael finds an abandoned baby on streets and names him Munna while Munna is growing up he to loves dancing likes his father and adores Michael Jackson. Munna dances on streets for living and is known as Munna Michael.Munna and his group is suddenly banned from entering night clubs in Mumbai following which he tries his luck in Delhi and comes across a gangster Mahendra Fauji who wants to learn dancing to impress club dancer Dolly he offers her a dancer's job in his hotel, but she suddenly disappears and Mahendra wants her any how. Munna promises Mahendra to find her but is in two minds as Mahendra has considered him as a brother while he has cold feeling towards Dolly.

programme.title: Desi Boyz
programme.desc: Based in England, Nikhil Mathur is employed as an Investment Banker and has a idealist girlfriend in Radhika Awasthi. His friend, Jignesh Patel, works as a Security Guard in a mall and is the guardian of Veer, his late sister's son, and under close scrutiny of the Social Services Department. Global recession takes a toll on Nikhil - he not only loses his job but also his investments, while Jignesh gets fired for failing to prevent theft by a minor. Nikhil is unable to find employment and after Jignesh gets fired from yet another job, the duo end up working as male escorts with 'Desi Boyz' as Rocco and Hunter, and bring in enough income to keep them going. Radhika soon finds out and dumps Nikhil, while a Social Worker, Vikrant Mehra, takes custody of Veer and has him placed in a foster home. With their lives turned upside down, the duo blame each other and part company. Unable to even speak with Radhika

programme.title: Munna Michael
programme.desc: Michael is an aging dancer in films is fired from his job as he looks older in between the young lot of dancers. Michael finds an abandoned baby on streets and names him Munna while Munna is growing up he to loves dancing likes his father and adores Michael Jackson. Munna dances on streets for living and is known as Munna Michael.Munna and his group is suddenly banned from entering night clubs in Mumbai following which he tries his luck in Delhi and comes across a gangster Mahendra Fauji who wants to learn dancing to impress club dancer Dolly he offers her a dancer's job in his hotel, but she suddenly disappears and Mahendra wants her any how. Munna promises Mahendra to find her but is in two minds as Mahendra has considered him as a brother while he has cold feeling towards Dolly.

programme.title: Tere Bina Jiya Jaye Na - Rerun
programme.desc: When an ordinary girl and a prince fall in love, they must overcome a series of challenges that threaten to ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Kundali Bhagya S3 Rerun
programme.desc: The story of Preeta and Shristhi, sisters who live with their father. Before dying their father reveals the truth that their mother is alive and living in Mumbai. Preeta and Shristhi's mother is Sarla Arora and they both are long lost sisters of Pragya (Kumkum Bhagya).

programme.title: Badho Bahu Rerun
programme.desc: Badho Bahu tells the story of an overweight girl, Komal, who gets the nickname Badho because of her physical appearance. Komal is made to perform heavy manual tasks that require physical strength. She is sweet, loving, energetic and simple girl. He has a big heart and helps most people in his town. Lucky Singh Ahlawat is a famous wrestler and is known for his looks. A series of events causes Komal and Lucky to get married.

programme.title: Desi Boyz
programme.desc: Based in England, Nikhil Mathur is employed as an Investment Banker and has a idealist girlfriend in Radhika Awasthi. His friend, Jignesh Patel, works as a Security Guard in a mall and is the guardian of Veer, his late sister's son, and under close scrutiny of the Social Services Department. Global recession takes a toll on Nikhil - he not only loses his job but also his investments, while Jignesh gets fired for failing to prevent theft by a minor. Nikhil is unable to find employment and after Jignesh gets fired from yet another job, the duo end up working as male escorts with 'Desi Boyz' as Rocco and Hunter, and bring in enough income to keep them going. Radhika soon finds out and dumps Nikhil, while a Social Worker, Vikrant Mehra, takes custody of Veer and has him placed in a foster home. With their lives turned upside down, the duo blame each other and part company. Unable to even speak with Radhika

programme.title: Guddan S1
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Kundali Bhagya S3
programme.desc: The story of Preeta and Shristhi, sisters who live with their father. Before dying their father reveals the truth that their mother is alive and living in Mumbai. Preeta and Shristhi's mother is Sarla Arora and they both are long lost sisters of Pragya (Kumkum Bhagya).

programme.desc: A 2015 release. After his family is killed during a bank robbery, a man tries to avenge their death. Stars: Radhika Apte, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Varun Dhawan.

programme.title: Satyamev Jayate
programme.desc: DCP Shivansh has been tasked to catch Vir, the man behind police killings in the city. Both are eventually against the same enemy but divided by a fine line, the law.2018

programme.title: Raksha Bandhan
programme.desc: The eldest brother to four sisters, a chaat shop seller relentlessly strives to keep his promise to his ailing mother while also upholding their family values.

programme.title: Gadar 2
programme.desc: When Tara Singh goes missing during a skirmish and is believed to be captured in Pakistan, his son Jeete sets out to rescue him and enters a labyrinth from which they both must escape at all costs.

programme.desc: A woman who was tricked into marriage falls in love with her evil husband's mute servant, and is locked in a room while her husband tries to get rid of her lover.
